meta.name: description
meta.content: GFW Schools is an independent public school district in South Central Minnesota. Originally formed to serve the communities of Gibbon, Fairfax and Winthrop, the district has expanded over time to encompasses large portions of other surrounding communities

GFW Schools is an independent public school district in South Central Minnesota. Originally formed to serve the communities of Gibbon, Fairfax and Winthrop, the district has expanded over time to encompasses large portions of other surrounding communities

div.class: meteor-slides homepage navprevnext { next: '#meteor-nexthomepage', prev: '#meteor-prevhomepage', pager: '#meteor-buttonshomepage' }

div.p:
Packets are being delivered on Monday to our 2020-2021 Kindergarten family's homes. Please fill them out and return them in the self addressed envelope included in your packet. If you are new to GFW Schools or have questions about something in the packet.
Contact us! (507)207-2216 or registration@gfwschools.org
The Monday, April 20th at 6:30 p.m. was held and recorded through electronic means in accordance with Minnesota Statute 13D.021 on April 20th, 2020.

Make your first goal CORRESPONDENCE.
Resources for all your Distance Learning needs.

Messages for parents, students, and staff from Lonnie Seifert, GFW Schools Superintendent, about the Coronavirus.
GFW SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.
